Color palette for the Shared Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs)

palette_IPCC_ssp.Rd

Representative Concentration Pathways (RCPs) and Socio-economic Pathways (SSPs), as indicated by the IPCC AR6 WGI style guide

Usage

palette_IPCC_ssp(
  ssp = c("SSP5-8.5", "SSP3-7.0", "SSP2-4.5", "SSP1-2.6", "SSP1-1.9")
)

Source

Page 9 form the IPCC style gyide: https://www.ipcc.ch/site/assets/uploads/2022/09/IPCC_AR6_WGI_VisualStyleGuide_2022.pdf

Arguments

ssp

A character vector specifying which SSPs are required. Options are `"SSP5-8.5"`, `"SSP3-7.0"`, `"SSP2-4.5"`, `"SSP1-2.6"` and `"SSP1-1.9"`

Value

A NAMED vector containing pairs for SSP names and colors.

Examples

palette_IPCC_ssp(ssp = "SSP5-8.5")
#>  SSP5-8.5 
#> "#941B1E"
